name: Off The Grid: Generator
description: Step out of your comfort zone. Generate a completely random loadout, from weapons and cyberlimbs to equipment and a unique class name. Perfect for a new challenge or when you're feeling indecisive.

name: Where We Droppin' (Extraction Royale)
description: Settle the squad's debate once and for all. Let fate decide your next drop point in Extraction Royale for a new strategic challenge every time.

name: Info Hub
description: Knowledge is power. Dive into a comprehensive database of in-game items. Browse detailed information and stats for weapons, body augments, and equipment.

name: More Tools on the Horizon!
description: The Field Kit is an ever-evolving project. We're always working on new tools and features to enhance your Off The Grid experience. Stay tuned for what's next!
